Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンから船に乗れば、 ベオ平原に行けるんだね。
Entry.EnglishText: We should be able to go to the Beo Plains if we take a boat from Nolzen.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「雲海にそびえし古の塔」<White>を目指して 突っ走ろうぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Full-speed ahead to the "<Cyan>ancient tower that soars above a sea of clouds<White>!"
